about_the_game:
Drifting Bottle Cap is a casual and exciting water flow physics simulation racing game.
You can choose your favorite bottle cap and watch it compete with other bottle caps in different levels.
The game has no storyline, why bottle caps work so hard depends entirely on your imagination.
The operation mode of the game is very simple. Click with the mouse and select the bottle cap that you are interested in, so you don't have to worry about anything afterwards.
It's both casual and fun.
The preferred game for idle game in the new era.

  • Fully realistic and high-tech drift physics simulation
  • Can only watch, cannot play, but every game is still tense and exciting, extremely suitable for fishing and leisure
  • Completely relying on luck, never testing skills, very friendly to opponents with disabilities, mild players, and high luck players
  • The entire process can be easily operated with just a mouse
    There are two modes: regular competition and free competition; Five major scenes, 20 small levels, and 3 final consecutive challenge levels
